title: Is gg ez still reportable?
body: I remember long ago Lyte came out saying something along the words of "gg ez" being reportable due to it always having a negative, unsportsmanlike nature. Just wondering if it's still reportable. I run into so many players that say it, and I thought for sure if it was a reportable offense, they'd refrain from saying it.

replies.body: It is still reportable.

It is reportable but you have to take into account a couple of things.

* **Did he Just say "ggez" without anything uttered before that?**

Well in that case I wouldn't really report it.
Reporting for the sake of getting someone punished is not my thing.
It doesn't change the outcome of the game and it really doesn't bother me much.
People like to boast.

* **Did he spam emotes, bm and had some toxic remarks before "ggez"?**

In that case i would report it. Behaviour like that is sure to tilt anyone.
It probably contributed to your tilt and the reason why you want to report them.
It goes beyond boasting at that point and just serves to insult.

Basically report it if it impacts you.
If it doesn't, just leave it be.
Some people just like to boast and pump their ego.
Yes.

No wonder people complain that the report system is broken, because 1/3 of all LoL players do it every game. 

It is not, unless you don't think the report system is broken or whatever.

??

Riot said it's reportable. And just because "1/3 of lol players do it" doesnt mean it's right.

Riot may have said it is reportable, but they will not do anything about it.

What, are they going to ban someone's account for saying gg ez 10 games in a row that they won? No.

Here's a question: when was the last time they said that is reportable? 2011?

What's your problem? Op asked if it was still a banable offense, and I said yes because it is.

Does it mean riot will ban you for one or 10 "gg ez"? Probably not. But 10 "kys" wont get you banned either. There are plenty of people who insult and verbally abuse without being banned a single time. Is that ok also?

Report for "Gg ez" wont get you banned on it's own, but it will help in getting you banned in general. You'll still have report under your name, and the more reports you get for a reason, the bigger the chances are of getting you banned. 

It is considered unsportsmanlike and we have that category to report for, so I really don't understand why are you so surprised.

1/3 of all LoL players do it every game because Riot has never punished one for the cause. I guess they'd poo their pinkie panties and think twice before writing it again, if they'd see people being banned for it.
If you report someone for saying GG EZ then you need to go find a new game lol. I don't say GG EZ inless the other team was really cocky but jesus get over it.
It's not an emotional thing. I just think your classless and I'd like to see you suffer.
Still seems like your butthurt that they said GG EZ lol, so I mean in this senerio who is really the one in the wrong?

No reason to be homophobic. 

The guy saying GG Ez doesn't care about anyone else. So watching them get banned is still the ideal situation. It's like prison. If you can't follow the rules we've all agreed on, then we remove you from society. 

No harm. No foul. You're just not welcome here.

Rules were made to be broken but you can't make broken rules.

People break and bend the rules all the time everywhere you go, League is no different.
Good luck in the real world, friend.
Seeing how I'm about to be 28, lived on my own since I was 18, have yet to be put in jail, I'd say I'm doing pretty well, friend.
Yeah? Through the internet? That's some nose. At any rate, whatever stench I do or do not smell, the ladies don't seem to mind. So whatever it is, I'll take it.

zzzzzzzzzzzzz.
You tried it I guess.

Not the gg ez player.

When someone's literary "fckin" with you, making fun of you or having 0/18 and winning only because his team is strong..........and then he writes GGEZ.. I swear I would go and smash his head. Instant report. bye.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

sure its reportable.  so is the enemy emoting at you.  report someone for whatever gets you upset.

but you should know no one is getting punished for either thing.

Ignorance. Here's my pity: {{item:3070}} 

When it's an established term that's ALWAYS used to make fun of and insult people, of course it's report-able.

Whether it is or it isn't, you should try my method of handling people who type gg ez:

I think silently in my head "go f*** yourself," then I click the home button and re-queue. is it really that tough to ignore a single comment when you can click one button and be removed from it?

I am a firm believer that level of toxicity needs to be reduced and constant offenders should be dealt with harshly, but at what point do people need to get an epidermis that is just a teeny tiny bit thicker?
yeah ggez is about the mildest trash talk there ever was and kids still flip out over it.  soft soft kids
You can report anything you want. The question is will they do anything about it? Doubt it.

Definitely still reportable. I got a penalty just yesterday for unsportsmanlike behavior lol.. This game is so soft. I usually say it when the enemy team trash talks a lot but I still end up winning. It appears you can't say anything in this game without getting reported lol. Either way, I'm done saying it because I'm not trying to get banned. I had the penalty notification pop-up but it doesn't appear like anything happened, I guess it was just a warning. No chat ban or anything.
Have you seen the chat. People say way worse things in chat than gg ez
It's unsportsmanlike conduct and as such reportable. I don't do it though, specially since I play with /all chat disabled so I won't ever even know somebody said in the first place.

Comments like those, even if it was report able, can't amount too much because of 1: how weak it is and 2: how often it happens. It is stuff like this that people complain that the report system is broken down. 

I don't care, but I am just stating why.

I'm on board with the whole reporting for negative behavior, verbal abuse and hate speech and all.. but this one is harmless IMO. Doesn't offend me at least. I don't stick around post game to see that stuff anyway.
